text: Hi Saint. Nice to 'meet' you. I'm a graduated in Film and Media (MA). I've always wanted to dedicate to vfx but I have never started at all. I have a bit of skills in Composing in After Effects and some 3D design and modelling in Cinema 4D and I've started learning some Zbrush but I want to focus more on Visual Effects. I have thought several times about starting a course (although most I can't afford it) but I would like to start with the basic principles on my own and start playing with the software before.Why do you think it would be better to start? Maybe Houdini?
